mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_pay_result_info
id,
appid,
mch_id,
device_info,
nonce_str,
sign,
sign_type,
result_code,
err_code,
err_code_des,
openid,
is_subscribe,
trade_type,
bank_type,
total_fee,
settlement_total_fee,
fee_type,
cash_fee,
cash_fee_type,
coupon_fee,
coupon_count,
coupon_type,
coupon_id,
coupon_fee_one,
transaction_idtransaction_id,
out_trade_no,
time_end,
create_time,
create_user,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{appid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{deviceInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{nonceStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sign,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{signType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{resultCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{errCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{errCodeDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{bankType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update tbl_pay_result_info
appid = #{appid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
mch_id = #{mchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
device_info = #{deviceInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
nonce_str = #{nonceStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
sign = #{sign,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
sign_type = #{signType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
result_code = #{resultCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
err_code = #{errCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
err_code_des = #{errCodeDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
is_subscribe = #{isSubscribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
trade_type = #{tradeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
bank_type = #{bankType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
total_fee = #{totalFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
settlement_total_fee = #{settlementTotalFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
fee_type = #{feeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
cash_fee = #{cashFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
cash_fee_type = #{cashFeeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
coupon_fee = #{couponFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
coupon_count = #{couponCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
coupon_type = #{couponType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
coupon_fee_one = #{couponFeeOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
transaction_idtransaction_id = #{transactionIdtransactionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
out_trade_no = #{outTradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
time_end = #{timeEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
where 1=1 and id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select count(1) as TOTALCOUNT from (
select
from tbl_pay_result_info where 1=1
and id like CONCAT(#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and appid like CONCAT(#{appid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and mch_id like CONCAT(#{mchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and device_info like CONCAT(#{deviceInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and nonce_str like CONCAT(#{nonceStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and sign like CONCAT(#{sign,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and sign_type like CONCAT(#{signType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and result_code like CONCAT(#{resultCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and err_code like CONCAT(#{errCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and err_code_des like CONCAT(#{errCodeDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and openid like CONCAT(#{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and is_subscribe like CONCAT(#{isSubscribe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and trade_type like CONCAT(#{tradeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and bank_type like CONCAT(#{bankType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and total_fee like CONCAT(#{totalFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and settlement_total_fee like CONCAT(#{settlementTotalFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and fee_type like CONCAT(#{feeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and cash_fee like CONCAT(#{cashFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and cash_fee_type like CONCAT(#{cashFeeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and coupon_fee like CONCAT(#{couponFee,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and coupon_count like CONCAT(#{couponCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and coupon_type like CONCAT(#{couponType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and coupon_id like CONCAT(#{couponId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and coupon_fee_one like CONCAT(#{couponFeeOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and transaction_idtransaction_id like CONCAT(#{transactionIdtransactionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and out_trade_no like CONCAT(#{outTradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and time_end like CONCAT(#{timeEnd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT(#{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT(#{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
limit #{limitStart,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{limitSize,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
) as TMP_COUNT_TABLE

select
from tbl_pay_result_info where 1=1 and id = #{0}
